UPDATE.LOG:
security/shibboleth-sp: Update to 3.2.2
This is a security fix for an issue that has not yet been disclosed. The vuxml entry will be updated once the CVE is available.
The patch to mitigate the vulnerability was introduced already on 2021-04-23 in the FreeBSD port as 3.2.1_1.
